allow: Bash(# From the xxd hex dump we saw clearly. Let me re-read the hex dump and extract field names # by reading 32-byte blocks starting at offset 32 # Extract 768 bytes starting at offset 32 \(the field descriptor area\) xxd -s 32 -l 736 /tmp/commune_shp/communes_2025T3.dbf # Parse: for each 32-byte block, the first 11 bytes are the field name # xxd line = offset: byte1 byte2 ... byte16 |chars| # So a 32-byte block = 2 lines of xxd # Let''s extract just the raw bytes and decode od -An -tx1 -j32 -N736 /tmp/commune_shp/communes_2025T3.dbf)
Bash(cd "D:/Sites Web/vivrea-project" && npx bmad-method install --tools claude-code --action compile-agents -y 2>&1)
